div.p: VPRS 5834/P0/1, inward correspondence p. 82, VA 1411 Industrial and Technological Museum, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Having learnt that the remuneration, due to Mr Hoffmann for his work for the Industrial Museum is likely to be passed in contract form, I have the honor to suggest that the payment due to him for Sept. and Octob. and a few days of November may be passed in the same manner by the Commissioners Two pay sheets are herewith submitted accordingly.
MS annotations: 'Refer to former correspnndence’ and ‘Read & rec. 10th Jan 71’. See M to […], November 1870 (in this edition as 70-11-00e); M to S. Bindon, 9 November 1870; M to M. Clarke, 14 November 1870; M. Clarke to M, 17 November 1870 (in this edition as 70-11-17b); M to M. Clarke, 5 December 1870 (in this edition as 70-12-05b); and M. Clarke to M, 5 December 1870 (in this edition as 70-12-05c).
